attributes.action: Order the sacking of two N Wales Police officers found guilty of dog cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Craig Macleod and Anja Mason two serving police officers with North Wales Police were yesterday found guilty of cruelty to animals including 240 hours of harrowing filming by a neighbour which showed these two beating their collie pup throwing him in the air and kicking him plus abhorrent treatment of a rottweiler.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
